ai-patthana1.8:136.1_1: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana1.8:136.1_2: the condition being by way of (intentional) deed condition;
ai-patthana1.8:137.1_0: happiness is a condition for the joyful thoughts connected with happiness. ...
ai-patthana1.8:137.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana1.8:137.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana1.8:137.1_3: the condition being by way of (intentional) deed condition;
ai-patthana1.8:138.1_0: happiness is a condition for the joyful in the objects of principles accompanied by bliss, and the objection of the teaching.
ai-patthana1.8:138.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana1.8:138.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana1.8:138.1_3: the condition being by way of (intentional) deed condition;
ai-patthana1.8:139.1_0: With happiness and equanimity, the rejoicing objects of the Dhamma is a condition for equanimity based on the object equanimous feeling ...
ai-patthana1.8:139.1_1: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana1.8:139.1_2: the condition being by way of (intentional) deed condition;
ai-patthana1.8:140.1_0: With happiness and joyfulness on the objects of the principles accompanied by happiness, and with the happiness as its object.
ai-patthana1.8:140.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana1.8:140.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana1.8:140.1_3: the condition being by way of (intentional) deed condition;
ai-patthana1.8:141.0.2_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana1.8:141.1_0: Not through the sake of the sixteenth or the object of the dancing, etc., do not turning back inside or poisonous snake or having a hundred penis, nor do they have a path in the forest, or even a lake in the shining track.
ai-patthana1.8:142.1_0: He should then grab a group with one’s border,
ai-patthana1.8:144.0.1_0: he is the one who constantly clothes,
ai-patthana1.8:144.1_0: Namely, no cause or reason for ten reasons not to lift up the corpses, or  interruptions or interruptions, organize dancing, organize their objects, and not bringing back some lips.
ai-patthana1.8:145.1_0: He should then bear it in mind as well.
ai-patthana1.8:146.1_0: To be experienced by the mind,
ai-patthana1.8:147.0.1_0: he is the one who obtains undergoing tendency to conceit,
ai-patthana1.8:147.1_0: Neither that causes and reasons, he does not enter upon the sixteenth section dealing with unobtained thought, ten dangers, ten thousand faculties, the ten powers, the ten powers, the sixteenth section declarations, and the paths of purification through the paths of the faculties, sixteen absorptions, ten recollections, and twenty-two faculties, ten powers,
ai-patthana1.8:148.1_0: he should take anyone back in the borderlands.
ai-patthana1.8:150.1_0: The group of one who has rapture is finished.
